scripts.uglify: uglifyjs wwwroot/js/katapp.js -c -m --output wwwroot/js/katapp.min.js && npm run convert-line-endings
scripts.convert-line-endings: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const filePath = 'wwwroot/js/katapp.min.js'; const content = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8'); const updatedContent = content.replace(/\n/g, '\r\n'); fs.writeFileSync(filePath, updatedContent, 'utf8');"
